testcase.name: Check the service GET method
testcase.system-out: * url url ................................................................. passed * def responsesGet = read('classpath:Karate/request/responsesGet.json') ... passed Given path 'users','2' .................................................... passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == responsesGet ........................................ passed And assert response.support.text == "To keep ReqRes free, contributions towards server costs are appreciated!" . passed And assert response.data.email == email ................................... passed
